mapper.update: UPDATE caigou_shoupiao set caigou_bianhao = #{caigouBianhao},shoupiao_danwei = #{shoupiaoDanwei},kaipiao_danwei = #{kaipiaoDanwei},kaipiao_riqi = #{kaipiaoRiqi},kaipiao_jine = #{kaipiaoJine},kaipiao_shuie = #{kaipiaoShuie},jiashui_heji = #{jiashuiHeji},beizhu = #{beizhu},xinxi_tuisong = #{xinxiTuisong},shoupiao_zhuangtai = #{shoupiaoZhuangtai} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from caigou_shoupiao where xinxi_tuisong = #{xinxi_tuisong} and shoupiao_zhuangtai = '待收票'

SELECT * from caigou_shoupiao where kaipiao_riqi >= #{start_date} and kaipiao_riqi <= #{stop_date} and shoupiao_danwei like '%' + #{shoupiao_danwei} + '%' and kaipiao_danwei like '%' + #{kaipiao_danwei} + '%' and shoupiao_zhuangtai like '%' + #{shoupiao_zhuangtai} + '%'

select id,bianhao,riqi,gongyingshang,dianpu,cangku,beizhu,caigou_id,ruku_danwei,yewuyuan,jiashui_xiaoji,ruku_id,isnull(caigou_bianhao,'') as xiaoshou_bianhao,isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as jiashui_heji,jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as weikai,jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) as this_kai,1 as isselect from (select * from caigou_ruku as ruku left join (select sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_xiaoji,0))) as jiashui_xiaoji,ruku_id from caigou_ruku_item group by ruku_id) as item on ruku.id = item.ruku_id) as ruku left join (select caigou_bianhao,sum(convert(float,isnull(jiashui_heji,0))) as jiashui_heji from caigou_shoupiao group by caigou_bianhao) as shoupiao on ruku.bianhao = shoupiao.caigou_bianhao where jiashui_xiaoji-isnull(jiashui_heji,0) > 0
